h3.a: School Closure Wednesday for Tropical Storm Gordon

div.p: The Poplarville School District will be closed Wednesday, September 5th due to Tropical Storm Gordon. Classes will resume on Thursday as normal unless stated here…

a.title: The Career Development Center (CDC is located at 9 Career Center Circle, Poplarville, MS 39470.   For more information, you can contact the CDC at (voice (601 795-8343 and (fax (601 795-1353. Principal: Dr. Marlene Cole
Information from Poplarville School District about COVID-19.
Welcome to the District Offices of Poplarville School District. Our address is 302 South Julia Street, Poplarville, MS 39470. You can reach us at (voice (601 795-8477 or (fax (601 795-0712.

Welcome to the “Healthy Hornet” !! Poplarville Lower Elementary Michelle Recatto, RN-BSN-NCSN 601-795-4736 Poplarville Upper Elementary Julie Tyner, RN 601-795-8303 Middle School of Poplarville Melissa Darden, RN-BSN-NCSN 601-795-1350

The Middle School of Poplarville serves students grades 6th through 8th. The campus is located at 6 Spirit St, Poplarville, MS 39470. You can reach MSP at (voice (601 795-1350 or (fax (601 795-1351. Principal: Heidi Dillon Assistant Principal: Keri Smith

The Poplarville High School serves students grades 9th through 12th. The campus is located at #1 Hornet Drive, Poplarville MS 39470. You can reach PHS at (voice (601 795 8424 or (fax (601 795-1345. Principal: Jonanthan Will Assistant Principal: Timmy Story

The Poplarville Lower Elementary serves students grades Kindergarten through 2nd grade. The campus is located at 804 South Julia Street, Poplarville, MS 39470.   You may reach the Lower Elementary at (voice (601795-4736 and (fax (601 795-6568. Principal: Candace Henderson Assistant Principal:

The Poplarville Upper Elementary serves students grades 3rd through 5th. The campus is located at  #1 Todd Circle, Poplarville, MS 39470. You can reach PUE at (voice (601 795-8303 or (fax (601 795-3104. Principal: Lynn Payne.  Assistant Principal: Loletha Needham

div.label: Older Articles

p.span: The Poplarville School District offers educational/vocational opportunities on a nondiscriminatory basis in compliance with the requirements of the following federal civil rights legislation: Title VI, Title IX, the Vocational Amendments of 1976 and 1979, Section 504 of the Rehabilitation Act of 1973, and the Individuals with Disabilities Educational Act. Further, the Poplarville School District offers equal educational and employment opportunities to all persons without regard to sex, race, religion, color, national origin, age, or disability. The district’s contact coordinator for compliance with these requirements is Stachia Peterson, 504 Coordinator, 302 South Julia Street, Poplarville, Mississippi 39470, Phone (601) 795-6153.
